title: Cattle population worldwide 2012 to 2019
summary: In general Cattle population in million head has stayed the same over the Year.
Cattle population in million head is roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, gradually decreasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and finally slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Cattle population in million head, of value 1008.57 was reached at Year 2014
Minimum Cattle population in million head about 969.26 was reached at Year 2015
